name: Tyrantrum
author: hatachu
flavor_text: Nothing could stop this Pokémon 100 million years ago, so it behaved like a king.

abilities.name: Tyrannical Heart
abilities.effect: As long as you don’t have more Pokémon in play than your opponent, this Pokémon’s attacks do 60 more damage (before applying Weakness and Resistance), and it takes 30 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Crunch
attacks.effect: Discard an Energy from your opponent’s Active Pokémon.
